configuration.disclaimer:
iMaps makes every effort to produce and publish the most current and accurate information possible. However, the maps are produced for information purposes, and are NOT surveys. No warranties, expressed or implied,are provided for the data therein, its use,or its interpretation.


Register of Deeds documents accessed through this site are unofficial. The official records are maintained at the Wake County Register of Deeds office. The Wake County Register of Deeds assumes no responsibility or liability associated with the use or misuse of this data.
